WSPA02 PHFO 221218
SIGPAO

KZAK SIGMET OSCAR 5 VALID 221220/221620 PHFO- 
OAKLAND OCEANIC FIR EMBD TS WI N0710 E17530 - N0300 E17640 - 
N0300 E17310 - N0650 E17210 - N0710 E17530. CB TOPS TO FL530. 
MOV W 10KT. WKN. BASED ON SAT AND LTG OBS.

UHMM MAGADAN FIR EMBD TS FCST N OF N60 AND S OF N67
TOP FL360 STNR WKN==
